content:
PR #93 adds a recording, replay, and simulation system for testing graphical apps cross-platform and efficiently in CI, along with significant architectural improvements.

Below is a demo running a recorded .rrsim in REPLAY mode - you can see me step through the recording and inspect input state etc.

roc-ray-alpha-5.gif

This is all in a very primitive form, we still only have a handful of drawing effects, but I think we've got a good foundation now to hit light speed and add all the other effects.
